LanguageData.Failure_FacilityBreakdown.label: Facility Breakdown
LanguageData.Failure_FacilityBreakdown.description: The facility has broken down during research
LanguageData.Failure_RadiationLeak.label: Radiation Leak
LanguageData.Failure_RadiationLeak.description: The facility is leaking a short burst of radiation
LanguageData.Failure_MicrowaveLeak.label: Microwave Leak
LanguageData.Failure_MicrowaveLeak.description: The facility is leaking microwave radiation
LanguageData.Failure_AcidLeak.label: Acid Leak
LanguageData.Failure_GasLeak.label: Gas Leak
LanguageData.Failure_GasLeak.description: The facility is leaking toxic gas
LanguageData.Failure_BlindingFlash.label: Blinding Flash
LanguageData.Failure_BlindingFlash.description: A blinding flash of light has emanated from the facility
LanguageData.Failure_ArcDischarge.label: Arc Discharge
LanguageData.Failure_ArcDischarge.description: An arc of high voltage electricity shot from the facility
LanguageData.Failure_LaserDischarge.label: Laser Discharge
LanguageData.Failure_LaserDischarge.description: A Laser discharge shot from the facility
LanguageData.Failure_Overvoltage.label: Overvoltage
LanguageData.Failure_Overvoltage.description: The facility has suffered a power surge and started a fire
LanguageData.Failure_ShortCircuit.label: Short Circuit
LanguageData.Failure_ShortCircuit.description: The facility has short-circuited. Switch off the power immediately or the building will be destroyed!
